name: Don't Break the Door (Ludum Dare 2016)
description:
Game was created as part of Ludum Dare 37 for the compo solo challenge. The theme was 'One Room'.

All design, programing, audio, etc was done during the 48 hour period. It's my first game jam and I learned a lot of things I didn't know how to do in Unity. Hope to continue doing game jams to sharpen my speed and skills.

Thanks for playing!

Vote for my game here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=121983
